name: Ludicolo
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.

ancient_trait.name: α Recovery
ancient_trait.effect: When this Pokémon is healed, double the amount healed.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Choose a random card from your opponent’s hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Splash Dance
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Splash Dance attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
